I was starting on a followup PR depending on this one showing that a profinite set is a limit of finite sets, but accidentally pushed my files to the branch for #7448 . Instead of resetting things with git, I figured the easier route is to just use #7448 for this as well. So if anyone is willing to take another look at the new changes to #7448, that would be helpful! It's not that many changes really...

I've cleaned up the PR itself a bit. The only change which is maybe not so obvious to see in the code itself is that I renamed topology/category/Profinite.lean to topology/category/Profinite/default.lean, as this PR also introduces a new file topology/category/Profinite/as_limit.lean.
